basic.name: Punish (Q)
basic.description: Step forward dealing 113 damage and Slowing enemies by 60% decaying over 2 seconds.

basic.name: Condemn (W)
basic.description: After 1 second, Johanna pulls nearby enemies toward her, Stunning them for 0.25 seconds and dealing 55 damage. Deals 200% increased damage to Minions and Mercenaries.

basic.name: Shield Glare (E)
basic.description: Deal 59 damage to enemies and Blind them for 1.5 seconds.

basic.name: Choose apprentice: (?)
basic.description: {highlight}Activate to choose an allied hero as an apprentice. If your choosen hero receives the MVP screen you will receive 20% extra XP for that match.{/highlight}.

heroic.name: Falling Sword (R)
heroic.description: Johanna leaps into the air for 2 seconds and she can steer the landing location by moving. While in the air, allies below Johanna are Unstoppable. Upon landing enemies hit take 225 damage and are Stunned for 0.25 seconds.

heroic.name: Blessed Shield (R)
heroic.description: Deal 114 damage and Stun the first enemy hit for 1.5 seconds. Blessed Shield then bounces to 2 nearby enemies, dealing 57 damage and Stunning them for 0.75 seconds.

trait.name: Iron Skin (T)
trait.description: Activate to grant Johanna a Shield that absorbs 810 damage for 4 seconds. While this Shield is active, Johanna is Unstoppable.

1.name: Zealous Glare
1.description: Shield Glare gains 1 additional charge, and deals 75% more damage.

1.name: Trip Attack
1.description: {highlight}If Shield Glare hits an close enemy Hero, Johanna's next Basic Attack gains 0.5 range and stuns the target for 0.6 seconds, plus 0.15 seconds per additional Hero hit by Shield Glare.{/highlight}

1.name: Consecration
1.description: {highlight}Shield Glare consecrates the ground increasing allied heroes healing received who stand in the area by 15%. The area lasts 5 seconds{/highlight}
passives: {highlight}Quest: Every 5 Regeneration Globes gathered increase the healing received by 5%{/highlight}

4.name: Subdue
4.description: Hitting 2 or more Heroes at the same time with Punish increases the Slow to 80% and the Slow amount does not decay.Quest: Hit 4 or more Heroes at the same time with Punish.Reward: Punish always Slows by 80%.

4.name: Sins Exposed
4.description: Punish reduces healing received by {highlight}30%{/highlight} for 3 seconds. Basic Attacks against them refresh this duration.
passives: {highlight}Quest: Hit 4 or more Heroes at the same time with Punish{/highlight}
{highlight}Reward: Basic attacks against marked targets grants Johanna 1 stack of 40 physical armor block.{/highlight}

4.name: Laws of Valor
4.description: {highlight}Hitting enemy Heroes with punish marks them. Allied heroes basic attacks against marked heroes grants them 20% attack speed for 2 seconds{/highlight}
passives: {highlight}Quest: Hit 4 or more Heroes at the same time with Punish{/highlight}
{highlight}Reward: Johanna basic attacks against marked heroes also heals 1.25% of maximum health of nearby heroes{/highlight}

7.name: Protect the Innocent
7.description: {highlight}Johanna redirects 65% of the damage taken to an allied hero to herself for 2 seconds being unable to act during that time.{/highlight}

7.name: Conviction
7.description: Gain 10% Movement Speed, increased to 20% while Condemn is charging up.

7.name: Steed Charge
7.description: Activate to instantly Mount for 3 seconds, unhindered by damage.
passives: {highlight}While unhindered Johanna Mount kills minions on contact instantly.{/highlight}
{highlight}While mounted Johanna restores 1% of her maximum health points per seconds increased to 5% while unhindered.{/highlight}

10.name: Falling Sword
10.description: Johanna leaps into the air for 2 seconds and she can steer the landing location by moving. While in the air, allies below Johanna are Unstoppable. Upon landing enemies hit take 225 damage and are Stunned for 0.25 seconds.

10.name: Blessed Shield
10.description: Deal 114 damage and Stun the first enemy hit for 1.5 seconds. Blessed Shield then bounces to 2 nearby enemies, dealing 57 damage and Stunning them for 0.75 seconds.

13.name: Shield Bash
13.description: {highlight}Increase Punish's damage by 50%. If you hit atleast 2 enemy heroes you can reactivate Punish dealing 125 damage and knock back enemy heroes. Increase Punish damage against shields by 300%{/highlight}

13.name: Holy Fury
13.description: Deal 15 damage per second to nearby enemies. Each Hero hit by Condemn increases this damage by 40% for 5 seconds. {highlight}Holy Fury damage is 300% stronger against Non-heroic units.{/highlight}

13.name: Blessed Hammer
13.description: Activate to create 2 hammers that spiral outward from Johanna, dealing 74 damage to enemies hit. Damaging enemies with Basic Abilities reduce the cooldown of this Ability by 2 seconds.Passive: Every 3rd Basic Attack against enemy Heroes releases a hammer.

16.name: Vacuum
16.description: {highlight}Create an outer area of Condemn, that area will pull enemy heroes with 200% stronger force and damage{/highlight}

16.name: Holy Renewal
16.description: Hitting enemy Heroes with Shield Glare reduce its cooldown by 1.5 seconds and heals for 5% of Johanna's maximum Health.

16.name: Divine Fortress
16.description: {highlight}Reduces all basic attack damage received from the direction you are facing by 40% returning the damage to the attacker while reducing 0.4 seconds of Iron Skin's cooldown up to 10 seconds.{/highlight}

20.name: Heaven's Fury
20.description: Falling Sword rains down holy bolts, dealing 50 damage to enemies, healing allied Heroes for 68, and reducing its cooldown by 1 second for each Hero hit.

20.name: Radiating Faith
20.description: Increase the number of enemies hit by Blessed Shield by 2. Its Stun duration is increased to 1.75 seconds and all targets hit are Stunned for the maximum duration.

20.name: Indestructible
20.description: {highlight}Upon taking fatal damage, Johanna gains a Shield equal to her maximum Health for 4 seconds. Can be activated to grant nearby allied heroes a shield equal to 25% of their maximum Health for 3 seconds setting the cooldown to 60 seconds. Hitting Heroes with Shield Glare reduces the cooldown of this ability by 8 seconds.{/highlight}

20.name: Akarat's Champion
20.description: {highlight}Activate to increase Johanna attack speed by 60% for 6 seconds. Johanna Basic attacks now cleave they also reduce Johanna's Ability cooldowns by 0.5 seconds on every enemy hit.{/highlight}
